rules_text: As long as it's your turn, instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard have escape. The escape cost is equal to the card's mana cost plus “Discard a land card.”
flavor_text: [i]The magic of the afterlife is a pale imitation of the ancient power of the stars.[/i]
notes: !append (You may cast a card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
